Lola Pettway (amụrụ n'afọ 1941) bụ ónyé America na-ese ihe

A na-ejikọta ya na ndị otu Gee's Bend quilting, ya na nné ya, Allie Pettway. E gosipụtara ọrụ ya na Museum of Fine Arts, Houston na Frist Art Museum, ma tinye ya na nchịkọta nkè Metropolitan Museum of Art.
Site n'ọtụtụ ndị na-emepụta ákwà, nné Lola bụ Henrietta Pettway na nne ya bụ Allie Pettway
Nnà ya bụ John the Baptist Pettway.
A zụlitere ya na ụmụnne nwanyị itoolu na ụmụnne nwoke anọ
Ọ malitere ibu ọrụ ezinụlọ mgbè ọ dị obérè
Ọ malitere isi nri mgbè ọ dị afọ itoolu, na-arụ ọrụ n'ọhịa mgbè ọ dị iri, ma na-akpa ákwà n'otu afọ ahụ
Ya na nwanne ya nwoke nke okenye, Ebenezer, na-asọ mpi nke ukwuu: "...ọ bụrụ na ọ wepụtara narị pound abụọ, ọ wepụtara otu narị abụọ, kwa.
Lola lụrụ di ma zụlite ụmụ iri na abụọ.
